トピック.授業外学習2: Students should come to every class well prepared, complete all homework assignments, and actively participate in class activities.

評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
2 x essays (2x20%)

Classwork (30%)

Students must earn a grade of 60% or higher to pass.
A student with six or more absences will receive a failing score.
